text: Nocardioides albertanoniae is a gram-positive, aerobic and non-spore-forming bacterium from the genus Nocardioides that has been isolated from green biofilm growing on a wall of the Domitilla Catacombs in Rome, Italy.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides albertanoniae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase albertanoniae Category:Bacteria described in 2013
title: Nocardioides albertanoniae
